sub_title: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
summary: Ik ben een gepassioneerd agilist die focust op de héle organisatie. Met 20 jaar IT ervaring en diepgaande agile kennis ben ik de smeerolie in je bedrijf. Ik breng mensen met elkaar in contact, geef duwtjes waar nodig, verbeter processen en communicatie binnen teams, tussen teams én daar omheen. Steeds geïnformeerd, nooit een doorgeefluik, want dan creëer ik ruis.De basis van mijn werk is een rotsvast geloof in de kracht van zelforganisatie.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

projects.title: Data Warehouse Developer
projects.description: I was hired to participate in the BI team to implement Data Vault DWH solutions. Currently I'm bypassing the data vault to deliver data from a new ERP system to a legacy data mart.

Teammanager Business Intelligence (BI) bij GGz Breburg

projects.title: Embed BI function in business
projects.description:
The WSW (Waarborgfonds Sociale Woningbouw) has recently implemented a data warehouse and BI solution to support its core business.

I was asked to improve the current system and make sure the BI function is embedded in the standing organisation. The responsibilities include:

- Improve overall system
- Create permanent organisation structure
- Functional design
- Delivery management
- Acceptation testing

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Informatiemanagement | Security | Cloud | Data

projects.title: Extend Quality Management System
projects.description:
For the fabrication of MR system the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has very strict rules about testing of the systems and components and the archiving of test data. Philips Healthcare has therefore decided to set up a data warehouse for the storage of this information. Secondary objective of the project was a comprehensive reporting system for the production departments of quality information.

The first version of the system was due for a thorough revision and expansion, including a migration from Oracle to Microsoft SQL Server. The team aimed to simplify the system and the end user reports as much as possible.

I have advised the client on the database, ETL and report design.  Furthermore, I’ve executed the migration to SQL Server, co-operated in the development of the ETL, the database and the end user reports.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Freelance | Business Intelligence & Advanced Analytics | Developer, Analist, Project Manager
Development Engineer at ABN AMRO Bank N.V.

projects.title: Online Marketing Intelligence Solution
projects.description:
ConanDoyle B.V. partners with one of the leading Dutch website that consumers use to compare prices for energy suppliers. The goal of the partnership is to provide energy companies with intelligence on consumer behavior on the site and the response to on-site marketing in particular.

I have designed and built the entire system using SQL Azure, Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services, Analysis Services and Panorama Novaview.

Business analist, product owner, BI/DWH/Business Analytics projectleider,  Proces analist (+31610535547)

projects.title: Create BIbox
projects.description:
BIbox was intended to be the new online, fast data warehousing solution from Sogeti. It was created with, amongst other tools,  Microsoft SQL Server and BIReady, in close co-operation with the BIReady founders.

It was my responsibility to create the application infrastructure.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Business analist, product owner, BI/DWH/Business Analytics projectleider,  Proces analist (+31610535547)

projects.title: Advise on creation of BI Competence Center
projects.description:
The city of Rotterdam has outsourced the execution of their policies with some 20 operational services. The gain a better view and understanding of the operational performance of the entire city, the client decided to create a new, comprehensive BI solution.

The client was aware of the fact that a successful project started with a professional organization. I was asked to write an advisory report on how to create such an organization. Based on Sogeti’s DIABOLO methodology, I advised on how to set-up a lean, but fully capably BI Competence Center.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.

projects.title: Creation of RADAR data warehouse front-end
projects.description:
Philips Medical Systems gathers status information of MR systems that are operational at the client locations. This information allows the company to increase the effectively of their support department. The ultimate goal is to predict technical problems using data mining technology.

I was responsible for the design and delivery of the complete front-end part of the system. This included SQL Server 2005 Analysis Services, ProClarity, SharePoint and Excel 2007.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
BI Specialist bij Pincvision
Business Intelligence Consultant

projects.title: Introduction of management information solution
projects.description:
Sanofi Aventis is one of the world’s leading pharma companies. Their Dutch office was having increasing problems with the lack of a comprehensive management information solution. As they were already implementing Cognos Planning and had decided on the use of Cognos BI, the client was in need of a more structured approach to BI.

I was asked to advise on, design and build a BI solution. Using an incremental approach guided by Kimball, we started with the integration of the various sources of sales data. Eventually we used Cognos BI for the reporting and fed and retrieved data to and from Cognos Planning. This gave the client a comprehensive insight in the planning and actual performance.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Senior Solution Architect IBM Cognos Analytics

projects.title: Migration Analysis Services 2000 to Analysis Services 2005
projects.description:
As a result of the Enterprise Data Warehouse Project, Philips Consumer Electronics was using Analysis Services 2000 and Panorama Novaview intensively. With the upcoming release of SQL Server 2005, the client needed an estimate of the amount of work needed for a migration.

In co-operation between Microsoft, Philips and Atos Origin I participated in the SQL Server 2005 Beta program. This included an invitation to visit Microsoft HQ in Redmond and perform a pilot migration in the Microsoft Customer Migration Lab. Together we re-designed and re-built the most complex Analysis Services 2000 solution for Philips Consumer Electronics in Analysis Services 2005. The project was executed in close co-operation with the Microsoft Analysis Services product team.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Senior Business Intelligence Architect at Zicht, risico- en verzekeringsadviseurs

projects.title: BI Architecture Review
projects.description: Vodafone is one of the world’s largest telco companies. After finishing the initial implantation of Cognos Planning, the client quickly came to the conclusion that the chosen architecture didn’t work as expected. I was asked to review the entire architecture on site at the Corporate Headquarters in the UK and provide advice on a better approach.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.

projects.title: Creation of financial reporting solution with Excel
projects.description:
Unilever Ice Cream & Frozen Foods used activity based costing for their pricing calculations. This was implemented using SAS Oros. The financial controllers at the divisional HQ in Rotterdam were in need of a more comprehensive solution that allowed them more insight in the data.

I was asked to create a reporting solution with SQL Server 2000 and Microsoft Excel.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Freelance | Business Intelligence & Advanced Analytics | Developer, Analist, Project Manager

projects.title: Pilot Project Customer Intelligence
projects.description:
As a result of the European deployment of Siebel, Imperial Tobacco felt the need for a system that allowed them to analyze the effectiveness of their sales force and sales force automation. I was asked to create an example of such a system. The project acted as a pilot or the entire European Imperial Tobacco organization.

The team created a prototype with Microsoft Analysis Services 2000, Microsoft SQL Server and Panorama Novaview. I’ve also coached a graduate student of the Tilburg University in his thesis concerning data mining on this data.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
Freelance | Business Intelligence & Advanced Analytics | Developer, Analist, Project Manager
Business Intelligence Consultant

projects.title: Creation of Kalido Data Warehouse
projects.description:
Philips increasingly focuses on leveraging its intellectual property. To allow the client to operate effectively in this competitive market, a comprehensive BI solution was needed. Tool used included Oracle, Kalido, Microsoft Analysis Services and Panorama Novaview.

As a team lead and front-end architect I contributed to the first three increments of the system.

contributors.headline: Gepassioneerd agilist met focus op de organisatie.
BI Consultant / Owner at Miessen Business Intelligence
Principal Consultant at Capgemini - Insights & Data
Data Governance Architect

projects.title: Front-end to Enterprise Data Warehouse
projects.description:
Philips Consumer Electronics had decided to centralize their management information provisioning. As a result, a program was started to create an Enterprise Data Warehouse solution using Kalido and Oracle, with Business Objects for the reporting.

BO however, was unable to meet the requirements. I have advised the client to switch to Microsoft Analysis Services and Panorama Novabiew. As the front-end architect I have contributed greatly to the design and delivery of the front-end solution. Furthermore, I’ve built a number of Kalido data marts.

profile_positions.title: Agile Coach at Equans

profile_positions.description:
Alphabet Netherlands is leading the way into a new future for BMW Group Financial Services. The opportunity to be in the forefront of the transformation to re-shaped, agile but most of all highly customer driven organisation is simply too good to let go. Leveraging my experience from the past position I joined Alphabet Netherlands to be the internal agile coach. The elephant is considerably smaller, but my influence on its dancing skills are significantly more substantial.

And the learning opportunity is endless!
profile_positions.title: Agile Coach

profile_positions.description:
Proud to lead a team of excellent BI Techs and Project Leads. I constantly work to strengthen "BI thinking" in our markets so my team can add even more value to our business. I make sure we utilise the budgets to the max, always searching for creative ways to create business value.

With this team I'm also leading the way in the agile transformation of Alphabet. We're learning while doing, finding our way.
